p: Italy and worldwide are experiencing an outbreak of a new coronavirus-related disease named COVID-19 due to SARS-CoV2 virus. Cases that develop severe pneumonitis are characterized by dyspnea, cyanosis and fever, which may configure the clinical framework of Acute Distress Respiratory Syndrome (ARDS) ( 1, 2). Because COVID-19 spread to more than 100 countries and accounted for several tens of thousands of cases within a few months, WHO declared COVID-19 a pandemic ( 3).
